data.title: A new billionaire has been minted nearly every day during the pandemic
data.description: Elon Musk is going after Insider for publishing a story alleging he sexually harassed a flight attendant on a SpaceX corporate jet in 2016 — but the news outlet's global editor-in-chief Nicholas Carlson is standing by his team's reporting.
